comment.author: 67632032@N06
comment._content: Going by the date on the movie posters in the background, this photo would be from 1937 as the 4th of May was a Tuesday in 1937.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales

comment._content: Yes, thanks, claxpro. We had checked that on a perpetual calendar but had just loaded the record for the whole collection. There is a date note on the catalog record
